actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to condemn terrorist killings of schoolchildren in Israel.

summary.text: Directs that the United States seek all means by which the civilized world may cut off from contact with civilized mankind any peoples or any nation giving sanctuary, support, sympathy, aid, or comfort to acts of murder and terrorism such as those just committed by Lebanese terrorists and that the Clerk of the House be directed to communicate these sentiments and expressions to the Secretary of State for appropriate transmittal.

titles.title: A resolution to condemn terrorist killings of schoolchildren in Israel.
